thread.title: Smriti Sinha to be a guest judge on a dance reality show
thread.title_full: Smriti Sinha to be a guest judge on a dance reality show - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Smriti Sinha to be a guest judge on a dance reality show
text:
Bhojpuri actress, Smriti Sinha, who plays Gandhari in Sony TV's, Suryaputra Karn , will now be seen as a guest judge on Colors Bangla's Bindaas Dance .
Smriti will make an appearance in a special episode of the show that will be telecast on Durga Puja. The actress has just finished shooting for the same in Kolkata.
The dance masters on this show are Ganesh Acharya, Joon Di and Sayantika Banerjee. This is the first time ever that a Bhojpuri actress will be seen judging a dance show on a Bangla channel. When asked about the same, Smriti said that since she knew Bengali, it wasn't difficult for her to be a part of the show.
Source: Bhojpurimedia.com
